title: Import Module Generator
description: Import a migration module package into the current project

module.description: Name of the module to import

packagePath.description: Path to the exported module package (directory, tar.gz, or zip file)

targetModule.description: Target module name (if different from source)

targetNumber.description: Target module number for gapped numbering (e.g., 030, 040)

configPath.description: Path to configuration file (config.json or config.yaml)

overwrite.description: Overwrite existing module if it exists

mergeConfig.description: Merge module configuration with existing config
